member.summary: Container base interface

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerBase.IsRegistered(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether an implemented type or instance is registered for the specified type.
member.param: Types to verify that they are registered
Name (key) to identify the registration contents if there are multiple registrations for the specified type
member.returns:
if you're registered
and if you don't
returns.

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerBase.IsRegisteredTypeId(System.Guid)
member.summary: Determines whether the type corresponding to the specified ID is registered
member.param: Type of ID to verify that you are registered
member.returns:
if you're registered
and if you don't
returns.

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerBase.IsRegisteredInstanceId(System.Guid)
member.summary: Determines whether an instance corresponding to the specified ID is registered
member.param: ID of the instance to verify that you are registered
member.returns:
if you're registered
and if you don't
returns.

member.summary: Determines whether the corresponding relationship of Model-ViewModel-View is registered
member.param: Model types of MVVM patterns
Name (key) to identify the registration contents if there are multiple registrations for the specified type

if you're registered

returns.

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerProvider.ResolveViewModel(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary:
Get the ViewModel associated with the specified Model
Generate and return instances.
If the ViewModel constructor requests a Model as an argument, pass the Model of this method argument.
member.param: Models of MVVM patterns
Name (key) to identify the registration contents if there are multiple registrations for the specified type

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerProvider.ResolveView(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary:
Get the View associated with the specified ViewModel
Generate and return instances.
If the View constructor requests the ViewModel as an argument, pass the ViewModel of this method argument.
member.param: MVVM Pattern ViewModel
Name (key) to identify the registration contents if there are multiple registrations for the specified type

member.name: T:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerRegistry
member.summary: Interface to Register Service to Container

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerRegistry.RegisterInstance(System.Type,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary:
Connect a specified instance to a specified type and register it in a container
Resolve Sometimes the same instance is returned every time.
Container holds the instance reference.
member.param: Types to Register
An instance that binds to a type
Name (key) to identify the registration contents for multiple registrations for the specified type

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerRegistry.RegisterSingleton(System.Type,System.Type,System.String)
member.summary:
Connect the specified implementation type to the specified type and register the lifecycle (scope) as Singleton in the container
Resolve Sometimes the same instance is returned every time.
Container holds the instance reference.
member.param: Types to Register
Implementation type that connects to the type
Name (key) to identify the registration contents for multiple registrations for the specified type

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerRegistry.RegisterSingleton(System.Type,System.Func{JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerProvider,System.Object},System.String)
member.summary:
Connect the specified factory method to the specified type and register the lifecycle (scope) as Singleton in the container
Resolve Sometimes the instance generated by the factory method is returned.
Resolve Sometimes the same instance is returned every time.
Container holds the instance reference.
member.param: Types to Register
A factory method to generate instances that relate to a type
Name (key) to identify the registration contents for multiple registrations for the specified type

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerRegistry.Register(System.Type,System.Type,System.String)
member.summary:
Connect the specified implementation type to the specified type and register the lifecycle (scope) as a Transient in the container
Resolve Sometimes a new instance is generated and returned each time.
The container does not hold the instance reference.
member.param: Types to Register
Implementation type that connects to the type
Name (key) to identify the registration contents for multiple registrations for the specified type

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerRegistry.Register(System.Type,System.Func{JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerProvider,System.Object},System.String)
member.summary:
Attach the specified factory method to the specified type and register the lifecycle (scope) as a Transient in the container
Resolve Sometimes the instance generated by the factory method is returned.
Resolve Sometimes a new instance is generated and returned each time.
The container does not hold the instance reference.
member.param: Types to Register
A factory method to generate instances that relate to a type
Name (key) to identify the registration contents for multiple registrations for the specified type

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerRegistry.RegisterTypeId(System.Guid,System.Type)
member.summary: Connect the specified type to the specified ID and register it in the container
member.param: Type ID
Type to attach to ID

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerRegistry.RegisterInstanceId(System.Guid,System.Object)
member.summary:
Attach the specified instance to the specified ID and register the lifecycle (scope) as a Transient in the container
The container holds the weak reference of the instance, so be careful that the registered instance is GC unless it is strongly referenced.
member.param: Type ID
Instance to attach to ID

member.name: M:JEOL.FEMTUS.Base.ContainerContract.IContainerRegistry.RegisterViewMap(System.Type,System.Type,System.Type,System.String)
member.summary:
Register the corresponding relationship of Model-ViewModel-View
You cannot register the same type multiple times: If either Model, ViewModel, or View is already registered, the registration will fail.
Only symbols can be registered; abstracts and interfaces cannot be registered.
member.param: Model types of MVVM patterns
Models of ViewModel in MVVM Patterns
Type of View for MVVM Patterns
Name (key) to identify the registration contents for multiple registrations for the specified type
